title: Manage the Appraisal Process
description: After a contract is signed, the buyer's lender orders an appraisal. The listing agent must provide information to the appraiser.

tasks.description: Schedule the appraisal appointment and ensure the appraiser has access to the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: The appraisal appointment is scheduled and confirmed.

tasks.description: Prepare an 'appraiser package' including a list of recent home improvements and the most relevant comparable sales.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the appraiser with helpful information to support the contract price.

tasks.description: Receive the appraisal report. If it comes in low, prepare a rebuttal or negotiate a price reduction with the buyer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The appraisal contingency is resolved, either by a successful appraisal or subsequent negotiation.
